tool.name: MaiqMag Training
tool.description: A tool to train model for high resolution predictions
tool.command: mkdir sim_data && #for $input in $sim_results ln -s $input sim_data/${input.element_identifier} && #end for export TORCHINDUCTOR_CACHE_DIR=/tmp/torchinductor && pixi run --as-is --manifest-path /app python -m maiqmag_ml train --root-dir sim_data --output $model > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2)
tool.help:
**MaiqMag Resolution Training**
This is a Galaxy tool to train the resolution model using Sunny/McVine digital twin simulations.
